sourcesContent: import React, { useMemo } from 'react' import { Button, Popconfirm } from 'antd' import { DeleteOutlined, EditOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' import { theme } from 'Styles/theme' import { ColumnsType } from 'antd/es/table' import { StatusImpeachment } from './types' type UseColumnsProps = { handleDelete: (id: string) => void, handleEdit: (id: string) => void, } const useColumns = ({ handleDelete, handleEdit }: UseColumnsProps): ColumnsType => { return useMemo(() => ([ { title: 'Status Impugnação', dataIndex: 'description', defaultSortOrder: 'ascend', sorter: true, ellipsis: true, key: 'description', }, { title: 'Ações', key: 'actions', align: 'center', width: 90, render: (status: StatusImpeachment) => ( <> Tem certeza que deseja exluir o status de impugnação?} okText="Sim" cancelText="Não" okType="danger" placement="topLeft" onConfirm={() => handleDelete(status._id)} >
